title: William Radice - Myths and Legends of India Vol. I - 2017
description: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Myths-Legends-India-Vol-1/dp/0143426206 Since time immemorial, India has been an ocean bed over which numerous stories have flowed and enriched the world. Storytellers from Tulsidas to Tohinton Mistry have added their magic to this magnificent repository. Inspired in part by Somadeva's Kathasaritasagara, William Radice collects these timeless tales of India, and tells them anew through his unique idiom. In Volume 1, the first section begins with the creation myth of Prajapati, while the Mahabharata section starts with Sakuntala's story, going up to the founding of Dvaraka by Krishna. Paperback: 501 pages Publisher: Penguin Books India (2 May 2016) Language: English ISBN-10: 0143426206 ISBN-13: 978-0143426202
